net.medcommons
Class RegisterServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          net.medcommons.IdentityServlet
              net.medcommons.RegisterServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class RegisterServlet
extends IdentityServlet

This servlet is the action for the register form. New users enter their email and verify a new password, and are given an MCID.

MCIDs are generated using the MCIDGenerator class.

See Also:
MCIDGenerator, Serialized Form
